1.title: I Never Planned on Marrying a Fat Girl

episode of.title: Love Handles: Couples in Crisis (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Two couples in crisis set out to lose the weight and rescue their troubled relationships. Meg & Jay: She doesn't know this, but he won't marry a fat bride...and she's been waiting for a ring that may never come. His anger issues trigger her father issues, holding this overweight couple hostage.

2.title: I Fantasize About Leaving Him

episode of.title: Love Handles: Couples in Crisis (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Ted & Drew: Constant bickering and bizarre eating rituals aren't the only obstacles that this couple faces. They are each other's biggest critics and their bad attitudes only reveal deep-seeded control issues. Will they be able to take responsibility for their horrible habits or will the first one to drop a few pounds be the first one out the door?

imdb.plot outline: Each one-hour episode follows the drama when two overweight couples battle the bulge and their relationship problems. Through 60 days of challenging workouts and relationship therapy, the couples will explore how they've reached the breaking point in their lives and how to get back on track. They've blamed each other, sabotaged each other and avoided the issues that threaten to end their love and even their lives. The ultimate question they must ask themselves is, "Can their relationship be fixed or is it too late?"
imdb.title: Love Handles: Couples in Crisis
akas: Love Handles: Couples in Crisis (United States)
